name: OldRope
tagline: OldRope creates 'choose your own adventure' games as a single HTML file. It has a similar function to Twine http://twinery.org (and Twine 2) but the games are simpler to deploy, install and play as there is only one HTML/Javascript file to distribute. Also the game is more robust as it does not depend on any external files.
body: The OldRope game generator is similar to Twine.
